resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102883</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102883</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085859</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Connecting with community through oral history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschließen an Gemeinschaft durch Mundgeschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se relier à la communauté par l'histoire orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conectar com a comunidade com o history oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegando con la Comunità con la storia orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνδεση με την κοινότητα μέσω της προφορικής ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El conectar con la comunidad con historia oral</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Through interviews and photographs, Harnett County students learn about their community's agricultural past.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch Interviews und Fotographien erlernen Harnett
Grafschaftkursteilnehmer über landwirtschaftliche Vergangenheit ihre 
Gemeinschaft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par des entrevues et des photographies, les 
étudiants du comté de Harnett se renseignent sur le passé agricole 
de la leur communauté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Através das entrevistas e das fotografias, os 
estudantes do condado de Harnett aprendem sobre o passado agricultural
da sua comunidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attraverso le interviste e le fotografie, gli 
allievi della contea di Harnett imparano circa l'esperienza agricola 
della loro Comunità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσω των συνεντεύξεων και των φωτογραφιών, οι 
σπουδαστές νομών Harnett μαθαίνουν για το γεωργικό παρελθόν 
της κοινότητάς τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">A través de entrevistas y de fotografías, los 
estudiantes del condado de Harnett aprenden sobre el pasado agrícola 
de su comunidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JEAN SWEENEY SHAWVER
FN:JEAN SWEENEY SHAWVER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085859</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102883</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/connecting-with-community-through-oral-history</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
